extendedInfo.description: Using only running and jumping, help Unique Rabbit reach his goals.  Rabbit by the horns, and get ready for a bad hare day!

reviews.title: Bad controls
reviews.comment: move forward after a vertical jump, defies physics.  Fix!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: A cute, brief story you could replay if you need to kill an hour or two. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun but short
reviews.comment: Fun platformer with a nice art style and some cute humour. The jump controls take a bit of getting used to. Only 15 levels, which is fine for a free game, but I wish there was a paid version with more levels. When you finish all the levels, it lets you play randomly generated levels, which does give it some replay value.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great mario style game!
reviews.comment: Initially, i was drawn to this game because admittedly, i like games that are \"cute\", like Abduction or Cut The Rope. But, i was pleasantly surprised by the artistic & creative design and interface. However, what i like the most about this game is that it\'s very similar to the gameplay of the original Super Mario Bros! Just as simple and addictive, and i was also impressed by the lack of ads - this is the first game i\'ve reviewed w/o prompting. I just wish the devs would add some more levels soon!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So cute!
reviews.comment: Cutest game ever, you just wanna keep playing and playing! And the puns are stupidly hilarious :) and although it does only have 15 level, it features extra random levels after you finish the first 15.  I love it and you should totally get it too!
